15/*! \file isc/aes.c */
16
17#include <config.h>
18
19#include <isc/assertions.h>
20#include <isc/aes.h>
21#include <isc/platform.h>
22#include <isc/string.h>
23#include <isc/types.h>
24#include <isc/util.h>
25
26#include <openssl/opensslv.h>
27#include <openssl/evp.h>
28
29#if OPENSSL_VERSION_NUMBER < 0x10100000L || defined(LIBRESSL_VERSION_NUMBER)
30#define EVP_CIPHER_CTX_new() &(_context), EVP_CIPHER_CTX_init(&_context)
31#define EVP_CIPHER_CTX_free(c) RUNTIME_CHECK(EVP_CIPHER_CTX_cleanup(c) == 1)
32#endif
33
34void
35isc_aes128_crypt(const unsigned char *key, const unsigned char *in,
36 unsigned char *out)
37{
38#if OPENSSL_VERSION_NUMBER < 0x10100000L || defined(LIBRESSL_VERSION_NUMBER)
39 EVP_CIPHER_CTX _context;
40#endif
41 EVP_CIPHER_CTX *c;
42 int len;
43
44 c = EVP_CIPHER_CTX_new();
45 RUNTIME_CHECK(c != NULL);
46 RUNTIME_CHECK(EVP_EncryptInit(c, EVP_aes_128_ecb(), key, NULL) == 1);
47 EVP_CIPHER_CTX_set_padding(c, 0);
48 RUNTIME_CHECK(EVP_EncryptUpdate(c, out, &len, in,
49 ISC_AES_BLOCK_LENGTH) == 1);
50 RUNTIME_CHECK(len == ISC_AES_BLOCK_LENGTH);
51 EVP_CIPHER_CTX_free(c);
52}
53
54void
55isc_aes192_crypt(const unsigned char *key, const unsigned char *in,
56 unsigned char *out)
57{
58#if OPENSSL_VERSION_NUMBER < 0x10100000L || defined(LIBRESSL_VERSION_NUMBER)
59 EVP_CIPHER_CTX _context;
60#endif
61 EVP_CIPHER_CTX *c;
62 int len;
63
64 c = EVP_CIPHER_CTX_new();
65 RUNTIME_CHECK(c != NULL);
66 RUNTIME_CHECK(EVP_EncryptInit(c, EVP_aes_192_ecb(), key, NULL) == 1);
67 EVP_CIPHER_CTX_set_padding(c, 0);
68 RUNTIME_CHECK(EVP_EncryptUpdate(c, out, &len, in,
69 ISC_AES_BLOCK_LENGTH) == 1);
70 RUNTIME_CHECK(len == ISC_AES_BLOCK_LENGTH);
71 EVP_CIPHER_CTX_free(c);
72}
73
74void
75isc_aes256_crypt(const unsigned char *key, const unsigned char *in,
76 unsigned char *out)
77{
78#if OPENSSL_VERSION_NUMBER < 0x10100000L || defined(LIBRESSL_VERSION_NUMBER)
79 EVP_CIPHER_CTX _context;
80#endif
81 EVP_CIPHER_CTX *c;
82 int len;
83
84 c = EVP_CIPHER_CTX_new();
85 RUNTIME_CHECK(c != NULL);
86 RUNTIME_CHECK(EVP_EncryptInit(c, EVP_aes_256_ecb(), key, NULL) == 1);
87 EVP_CIPHER_CTX_set_padding(c, 0);
88 RUNTIME_CHECK(EVP_EncryptUpdate(c, out, &len, in,
89 ISC_AES_BLOCK_LENGTH) == 1);
90 RUNTIME_CHECK(len == ISC_AES_BLOCK_LENGTH);
91 EVP_CIPHER_CTX_free(c);
92}
